entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
